com.team09.qanda.controllers

Class ThreadListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team09.qanda.controllers.ThreadListController

  • public class ThreadListController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class makes updates to a ThreadList object. The object passed to the constructor will be the one that will be changed. The methods use the getters and setters in ThreadList to perform more meaningful actions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadListController(ThreadList threadList)
      The constructor accepts a ThreadList object, which it will use and update.
      ThreadListController(ThreadList threadList, ElasticSearchHandler esh)
      An optional constructor with the choice to add a different ElasticSearchHandler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addThread(QuestionThread thread)
      Appends a QuestionThread to the end of the current list of QuestionThreads.
      void changeESHHandler(ElasticSearchHandler esh) 
      void changeSortType(SimpleSortFactory factory) 
      void cleanup()
      This function shuts down the connection to the elasticsearch server
      void clear()
      This clears the current list of QuestionThreads.
      void getMoreThreads()
      Requests 10 additional QuestionThreads from the server.
      void refreshThreads()
      Gets the most current data from the server.
      void removeThread(QuestionThread thread)
      Removes a given QuestionThread from the current list of QuestionThreads.
      void search(java.lang.String query) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadListController

        public ThreadListController(ThreadList threadList)
        The constructor accepts a ThreadList object, which it will use and update. By default it creates a standard ElasticSearchHandler to communicate with the server.
        Parameters:
        threadList - The ThreadList object to be used.

      • ThreadListController

        public ThreadListController(ThreadList threadList,
                            ElasticSearchHandler esh)
        An optional constructor with the choice to add a different ElasticSearchHandler. This can be used for testing to push questions to a different location than the main index.
        Parameters:
        threadList - The ThreadList object to be used.
        esh - The ElasticSearchHandler to communicate with the server

    • Method Detail

      • addThread

        public void addThread(QuestionThread thread)
        Appends a QuestionThread to the end of the current list of QuestionThreads.
        Parameters:
        thread - The QuestionThread to be added.

      • removeThread

        public void removeThread(QuestionThread thread)
        Removes a given QuestionThread from the current list of QuestionThreads. It does so by comparing the two ids. If there is no match, there will be no change to the ThreadList
        Parameters:
        thread - The QuestionThread to be removed.

      • refreshThreads

        public void refreshThreads()
        Gets the most current data from the server. Uses the values in the ThreadList to determine how many QuestionThreads to request and in what sorting order to return them.

      • getMoreThreads

        public void getMoreThreads()
        Requests 10 additional QuestionThreads from the server. This increments the value for number of threads in the ThreadList, and uses its value for sorting.

      • changeSortType

        public void changeSortType(SimpleSortFactory factory)
        Parameters:
        factory -

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String query)
        Parameters:
        query -

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This clears the current list of QuestionThreads. It has no effect on the sort type or number of threads.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        This function shuts down the connection to the elasticsearch server

      • changeESHHandler

        public void changeESHHandler(ElasticSearchHandler esh)
        Parameters:
        esh -
